features: Dreamlover wig caps to hold wig in place are made of stretchy nylon material that fits different head circumference for a more comfortable and headache-free fit.
Our brown wig cap for lace front wigs is designed for customers with brown skin. It blends in well with the dark skin, perfectly creating a bald cap method that provides you with a natural look.
With the light and breathable material, the bald cap for wigs helps to dissipate heat from your scalp without stuffy and itchy even after a period of wearing.
The thick and wide elastic band of brown stocking wig cap for wig making is not easy to become loose, which can hold your hair well and prevent the wig cap from slipping.

Whether you have short or long hair, our hair net for wigs will fit the bill. If you have long and thick hair, please braid your hair and pin them around your head as flat as possible before using Dreamlover wig cap.
description: Product Description Outstanding Workmanship Prevent Slippage Deamlover brown stocking cap with thicker and wider elastic band has increase the force area and the resistance between the wig cap and your forehead, which helps keep your wigs in place without slipping easily. Great Elasticity Very stretchy nylon material of our wig cap is elastic enough to fit different head sizes and hair lengths. If it's too tight for you, stretch the elastic band or place it on wig head for a few days to make it looser, which is more comfortabale for you. Dreamlover Wig Caps for Women Color: Our brown wig caps are suitable for women and men who have dark skin tone. It can match the dark skin tone perfectly and would not be noticed easily. High Quality: Dreamlover wig caps are made of great elastic nylon material with superb craftsmanship, which would not break off easily and ensure a long term use. Breathability: Our thin and soft fabric of stocking wig cap is breathable and comfortable for your scalp without any allergies, head itching or peculiar smell. Wearing Method Sleek or braid your hair and pin them as flat as possible before you wear the wig cap. After wearing, you can also use a few bobby pins to fasten the wig cap with your hair for more security. Advanced Wearing Method--- Bald Cap for Lace Front Wigs Using Instruction Step 1 : Wearing the dark brown wig cap to the desired position, and use a heavy hair spray or wig glue to stick down the wig cap. Step 2 : After the glue is completely dry, use scissor to cut the stocking cap from the middle to the suitable position. (Please use scissors carefully to avoid scratches) Step 3 : Cut away the excess wig cap along the line and trim the edges as smooth as possible. Step 4 : Using foundation or power makeup to cover the edges for a more seamless look to achieve bald head effect. (According to individual situation)
